statements: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE access_level = 1;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE completed_maintenance_work = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT employee_id, assigned_tasks FROM employees WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(assigned_tasks) > 0;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY employee_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE assigned_tasks @> ARRAY['task1', 'task2'] AND completed_maintenance_work = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE completed_maintenance_work = FALSE GROUP BY employee_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM employees ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 123;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT task_description, completion_status FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE assigned_to = 2;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE access_level = 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE access_level = 3;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE supervisor_id IS NULL;
SELECT task_id, task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE completed = false;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_work WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM employees JOIN maintenance_work ON employees.employee_id = maintenance_work.employee_id WHERE status = 'in progress';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, access_level FROM employees WHERE supervisor_id IS NULL;
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 3 AND completed = false ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(work_id) AS num_works FROM employees JOIN maintenance_work ON employees.employee_id = maintenance_work.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING num_works > 3;
SELECT task_name, start_date, end_date FROM tasks JOIN maintenance_work ON tasks.task_id = maintenance_work.task_id WHERE maintenance_work.status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, completion_date FROM employees JOIN maintenance_work ON employees.employee_id = maintenance_work.employee_id;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM work_log ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE access_level > 3;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, t.task_name, w.completion_date FROM employees e JOIN maintenance_work w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id JOIN tasks t ON w.task_id = t.task_id;
SELECT t.task_name, w.completion_date, l.log_description FROM tasks t JOIN maintenance_work w ON t.task_id = w.task_id JOIN work_log l ON w.work_id = l.work_id;
SELECT e.employee_name, COUNT(w.work_id) AS num_work_logs FROM employees e LEFT JOIN maintenance_work w ON e.employee_id = w.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_name;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, access_level, department FROM Employees WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM Tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM Tasks WHERE assigned_to = 3;
SELECT department_id, department_name, head_employee_id FROM Departments;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;

SELECT Tasks.task_name, Employees.employee_name, MaintenanceWork.status FROM Tasks JOIN Employees ON Tasks.assigned_to = Employees.employee_id JOIN MaintenanceWork ON Tasks.task_id = MaintenanceWork.task_id WHERE MaintenanceWork.status = 'In Progress';

SELECT Departments.department_name, COUNT(*) as employees_count FROM Employees JOIN Departments ON Employees.department = Departments.department_id GROUP BY Departments.department_name HAVING employees_count > 5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT head_employee_id FROM Departments);
SELECT employee_name, COUNT(log_id) as total_logins FROM Employees JOIN AccessLog ON Employees.employee_id = AccessLog.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name HAVING total_logins > 10;
